name: Mercedes-Benz
description: Founded 1926. Pioneers of luxury automobiles, safety innovations (ABS, airbags, ESP), and electric mobility with EQ series.

name: BMW
description: Founded 1916. Bayerische Motoren Werke. Known for performance, driving dynamics, and the iconic M division. Leader in electric i-series.

name: Audi
description: Founded 1909. Four rings symbolize the merger of four brands. Slogan: Vorsprung durch Technik. Innovators in quattro AWD and e-tron EVs.

name: Porsche
description: Founded 1931. Ferdinand Porsche's legacy. The 911 is an engineering icon. Taycan leads electric sports car innovation.

name: Volkswagen
description: Founded 1937. The 'People's Car' brand. Beetle is one of history's best-sellers. Now leading mass-market EV transition with ID family.

name: Bosch
description: Founded 1886. Global leader in automotive components: ABS, ESP, fuel injection, sensors. Also power tools and home appliances.

name: Siemens
description: Founded 1847. Diversified engineering giant: energy, automation, healthcare, transportation. Key player in Industry 4.0 and smart infrastructure.

name: SAP
description: Founded 1972. World's leading enterprise software company. ERP solutions power global businesses.

name: Adidas
description: Founded 1949. Iconic sportswear and footwear brand. Three stripes recognized worldwide.

name: BASF
description: Founded 1865. World's largest chemical producer. Innovations in materials, coatings, and sustainable chemistry.
